description.en-US: This extension gives you a fresh browser experience by configuring it with Ezy Photo Tab & Custom Web Search Easily crop, flip or rotate photographs from your gallery. Resize images for Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest & other social media posts in a jiffy! This easy-to-use extension also offers you Yahoo® search. Easily search for images, videos, and websites and access quality search results in seconds. This add-on is using Yahoo as a search provider. Have a suggestion on how we could improve your experience? Please share your feedback. You can uninstall the extension if you are not satisfied with the product. I confirm that I have read and agree to abide by the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service of Ezy Photo Tab & Custom Web Search and by clicking the button above I agree to install this extension. Yahoo is a registered trademark of Apollo Global Management, Inc. Our Privacy Policy: ezyphototab.com is a product offered by Innover Group. We provide users with ease of access to information and widgets from their browser. Our Privacy Policy is important for us to continue providing the users with the best possible all-round experience. Here’s a summary of user data that our add-on collects and how we use this information: 1. IP address: We collect your IP address when you use the photo and video editing features, background removal and logo related features on the tool offered by our extension. We anonymise your IP address and do not trace it back to you. We only use this information for analytics and reporting purposes. You can opt-out of sharing the above information with us, however, you will only be able to access limited features. 2. Technical data: Technical information (such as domain name and user agent ) is also collected by the add-on to plan product upgrades and help with fraud detection. This data is not personally identifiable and is used for optimization purposes and cannot be used to identify users. 3. Information you explicitly share with us: We collect and process any information including but not limited to files, images and videos that you provide while using photo and video editing features, background removal and logo related features on the tool available on our extension to return relevant results. We may also collect information that you may choose to provide us (such as your name, telephone number and/or email address) if submitted by you as part of a feedback form, crash report, enhancement suggestion or other communication from you to us. This information is only used to respond to user queries or concerns and will not be shared with any third party. Privacy Policy: https://ezyphototab.com/pictab/privacypolicy_ff.html Terms of Service: https://ezyphototab.com/pictab/termsofservice_ff.html

name.en-US: Ezy Photo Tab & Custom Web Search

summary.en-US: Add the Ezy Photo Tab & Custom Web Search extension and click the icon on your toolbar to access editing sites & Yahoo® search
